timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            Apollo Client for Android supports includes support for RxJava 2.x.
          
          
            
            Apollo Client for Android includes support for RxJava 2.x.
timeline.author: martinbonnin
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,8 +1,8 @@
 ---
-title: RxJava2 support 
+title: RxJava
 ---
 
-The Apollo GraphQL client comes with RxJava2 support.
+Apollo Client for Android supports includes support for RxJava 2.x.

timeline.author: martinbonnin
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,13 +1,9 @@
 ---
 title: Introduction
-description: A strongly-typed, caching GraphQL client for Android, written in Java
+description: Add GraphQL to your Android apps
 ---
 
-Apollo Android has been [launched](https://blog.apollographql.com/launching-apollo-graphql-on-android-40ee0b5789bd) and is ready to try in your app today!
